body.name: OMBAR Dash Cam Front and Rear 5G WiFi, Dash Cam 4K/2K/1080P+1080P, Dash Camera for Cars with 3.18" LCD Screen, Dashcam Car Camera with WDR Night Vision, G-Sensor, Loop Recording, SD Card Not Included
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 1 hr 43 mins
features: 【4K Dash Cam Front and Rear】OMBAR M572 dash camera monitor the front and rear of your car simultaneously in 4K/2K/1080P+1080P resolution. Never miss a moment with a 170° front, and 150° rear view. Rear camera support rotate 360° flexibly. Surveillance coverage of 360° full protection, providing valuable evidence for insurance claims or disputes. Note: Do not plug or unplug the rear camera during use, disconnect the dashcam's power first before operating.

【Built-in 5G WiFi & App Control】The dash cam has built-in Dual-Band WiFi (2.4GHz & 5.0GHz) for faster transfer speed (not support remotely view live on your phone from home, effective WiFi signal range is about 25ft). Free app "Oncam", allowing you to easily control the dash camera, view, download (Support iPhone & Android), or share videos.

【Reliable Witness for Accident】G-sensor auto detect a collision and lock the file to prevent that from an overwrite; Built-in super capacitor (without battery), allow withstand extreme temperatures from -4°F to 158°F, the working temperature of dashcam is 30℃ to 50℃, so it is normal for your dash camera to run slightly hot; Must formate the SD card before first-time use, support max up to 256GB. Note: SD card not included, need to purchase separately.(Asin: B0CBRG16X4)

【2 Parking Modes for 24/7 Protection】Time-Lapse 1fps Parking Mode: The car camera will keep recording continuously at one frame per second rate to ensure maximum recording quantity; Collision Detection Parking Mode: Allows the car camera to automatically initiate recording for 1min when G-sensor is triggered by a collision. Note: 24Hrs parking monitor require the 3-Lead Hardwire Kit(Not included in the package, need to purchase separately Asin: B0BNPWTSBH).

【Warranty & Support】OMBAR 4K dash cam front and rear must be powered by cigarette lighter port, so it comes with wires(must ALWAYS connect with power when using). Note: Wi-Fi doesn't mean wireless, only for connection between your phone with dashcam when you need to view videos by phone. The dash camera comes with a full 12 months warranty, if you have any question regarding your product, please do not hesitate to contact us via Amazon, after-sale service is 7/24 on standby.

What are the advantages of 5G WiFi? For 4K dash cam, 2.4G wifi could not meet requirements, the transmission speed of 5G is about 2-4 times that of 2.4G, up to 10MB/s What is the difference between H.265 and H.264? The main difference is that HEVC (H.265) allows for further reduced file size. H.264 (AVC) can be chosen for compatibility with older desktop and mobile devices. We recommend VLC Media Player on PC to play videos. How to use parking monitoring function? Do I have to buy a separate hardwire kit? Yes, parking monitoring function require the hardwire kit and protect the car battery from depleting. Hardwire kit is not included, you need to buy it separately (Asin: B0BNPWTSBH). Is normal for my dash cam to get hot? OMBAR 572 allow withstand extreme temperatures from -4°F to 158°F(-20°-70°), the normal working temperature is about 30℃ to 50℃, so it is normal for your dash camera to run slightly hot, especially in 4K recording. What should I pay attention to when using it for the first time? Pls tear off all protective film before using the dash cam for the first time. You MUST formate the SD card before the first-time use. Pls ALWAYS connect with power when using as it is built in Super Capacitor(without battery).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Performance and Features - A Top-Notch Dash Cam!
reviews.reviewText: The OMBAR Dash Cam Front and Rear exceeded my expectations, delivering an outstanding performance that truly stands out in the crowded dash cam market. This feature-packed device has become an essential part of my daily commute, providing peace of mind with its advanced capabilities.The 5G WiFi connectivity ensures seamless video streaming and quick file transfers, making it a breeze to access and share footage. The dual-camera setup, offering 4K/2K/1080P+1080P resolution, captures crystal-clear video quality both in front and behind the vehicle. The 3.18" LCD screen is large enough for easy navigation through settings and playback.One of the standout features is the WDR Night Vision, which delivers exceptional clarity in low-light conditions. The footage is crisp, detailed, and offers a reliable record of events, day or night. The build quality is robust, and the dash cam feels durable and well-made.Installation was straightforward, and the user-friendly interface made it easy to customize settings to my preference. The loop recording feature ensures that I never miss a moment, and the G-sensor automatically saves critical footage in the event of an impact.In summary, the OMBAR Dash Cam is a top-notch investment for anyone looking to enhance their road safety and document their journeys. With its impressive video quality, WiFi capabilities, and reliable night vision, this dash cam earns a well-deserved 5 stars. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning and Sturdy Dash Cam - Go for it!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this Dash Cam, but it has truly exceeded my expectations. The sleek design seamlessly blends into my car's interior, and the installation was easy. The video quality is crystal clear, capturing every detail on the road.The night vision feature is very impressive. It automatically starts recording when I turn on the ignition, providing a continuous loop of footage. The G-sensor is a valuable addition, saving important clips in case of sudden stops or collisions.The menu is very friendly which easily allow to access the settings and playback. I appreciate the loop recording function, eliminating the need to manually manage storage and the parking monitor feature let you live at ease not to worry about the car at the parking anytime.The build quality feels robust, and the adhesive mount holds the dash cam securely in place. Additionally, the included app allows me to conveniently view and download footage on my phone.In summary, this Ombar Dash Cam offers reliability, impressive features, and peace of mind on the road. It's a worthwhile investment for anyone seeking a trustworthy and user-friendly dashboard camera for your car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dash cam
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this Dash Cam for about a week and so far I am very pleased. Installation was tedious as expected for any front & rear dash cam, but I was pleased to see the product came with a tool which made it much easier to tuck in and hide wires. Easy to install. Small and unobtrusive - not an issue at all after installing it on the windshield below my mirror. Immediately connects to my phone every time I start my car. Creates great videos and easy to download a video directly to my phone if needed. Will recommend to anyone who looking for a new dash cam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good unit, worth every penny
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I shopped around for dash cams and then finally landed on this one and I couldn't be more impressed with its performance. I can finally go on daily commute with a sense of security. The packaging was quite an overkill giving a quiet premium feel which is justified with the price. Installation was easy, just peel off the plastic and the stick to the windshield (Honda Civic 2015). I forgot to clean off the windshield before sticking it on but it seems sturdy enough to last a long time. The included car charger was quite long and meant to be tucked into the rubber panels of the door and the windshield, but I didn't do it because of the hassle. The dangling power line doesn't bother me anyway. The recorded video was quite crispy and good clarity. At highest resolution, a 1 hour commute takes about 10 GB storage. With a 128G micro SD card, it's enough to record 5 days of commute for me, which is more than sufficient. The angle is wide enough to capture everything I can see through the windshield. The night vision is clear enough to record all the license plates of cars around me, a peace of mind for night driving. I haven't tested Wi-Fi connection yet, but I can see why it may come handy when needed. The unit is in black so it can be warm to the touch under California sun, but it's not affecting the performance or caused any issue. Playing back on the LCD on highest resolution can lag a frame every few seconds, not easy to notice, but once you do it becomes more obvious. Not a deal breaker as mostly the videos are being viewed on a computer or cell phone. Overall, it's being a good investment. For a dash cam you'd want something of good quality and reliability instead of some cheap crap under $50.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality & Ease of use
reviews.reviewText: I received this today. Installed the front camera in about half an hour routing the cable under the trim. Rear camera took longer (just over an hour), again routing the cable uner the trims. Set up is very easy. Connection to device wifi is stable. Once connected the phone app is quite easy to navigate through. Videos and photos can easily be downloaded from the app. Wifi needs to be turned on in the camera setting each time the camera is turned on, which is a little tedious but it works. Working with the buttons on the camera is a little clunky. Once you get used to it then it's ok also. Video quality, day or night, is exceptional on both cameras. I find the magnetic connector very useful to take the camera off or put it back on a again. Very happy so far! Will report back should anything go wrong in the coming days/weeks.
